import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { CommonModule } from '@angular/common'; @Component({ selector: 'app-about', standalone: true, imports: [CommonModule], template: `
Est. 2018

Engineering Digital Excellence

SENIOR DEVELOPER

Background

Architecting for the future.

As a Senior Frontend Architect, I don't just write code—I build scalable ecosystems. With over 6 years of experience specializing in the Angular and Ionic landscape, I’ve delivered enterprise-grade solutions for global clients.

My philosophy centers on performance, accessibility, and high-fidelity user experiences. I believe the best applications are those that feel invisible yet indispensable.

50+
Projects Delivered
12k+
Git Commits
` }) export class AboutComponent { }
